title: FODMAP Food List & Assessment
description: Comprehensive guide to high and low FODMAP foods for digestive health management. The FODMAP diet is used to manage digestive symptoms, particularly for IBS. Elimination phase typically lasts 2-6 weeks, followed by systematic reintroduction. Should be implemented under guidance of a registered dietitian or nutritionist.

sections.title: Vegetables and Legumes
sections.description: Track your client's tolerance and notes for different vegetables and legumes

fields.label: High FODMAP Vegetables
fields.help_text: Garlic, Onions, Asparagus, Beans (black, broad, kidney, lima), Cauliflower, Cabbage, Peas, Scallions

fields.label: Low FODMAP Vegetables
fields.help_text: Bamboo Shoots, Bean Sprouts, Broccoli, Cabbage, Carrots, Celery, Chick Peas, Corn, Cucumber, Eggplant, Green Beans, Green Pepper, Kale, Lettuce (butter, iceberg, rocket), Parsnip, Potato, Pumpkin, Red Peppers, Squash, Sweet Potato, Tomatoes, Turnip

fields.label: Notes & Observations
fields.placeholder: Document client's tolerance, symptoms, or preferences

sections.title: Fruits
sections.description: Track your client's tolerance and notes for different fruits

fields.label: High FODMAP Fruits
fields.help_text: Apples, Apricot, Avocado, Bananas, Blackberries, Grapefruit, Mango, Peaches, Pears, Plums, Raisins, Sultanas, Watermelon

fields.label: Low FODMAP Fruits
fields.help_text: Bananas, Cantaloupe, Cranberry, Clementine, Grapes, Melons (honeydew), Kiwi, Lemon, Orange, Pineapple, Raspberry, Rhubarb, Strawberry

fields.label: Notes & Observations
fields.placeholder: Document client's tolerance, symptoms, or preferences

sections.title: Meats
sections.description: Track your client's tolerance and notes for different meats

fields.label: Low FODMAP Meats
fields.help_text: Beef, Chicken, Lamb, Pork, Cold Cuts (ham and turkey breast)

fields.label: Notes & Observations
fields.placeholder: Document client's tolerance, symptoms, or preferences

sections.title: Grains
sections.description: Track your client's tolerance and notes for different grains

fields.label: Low FODMAP Grains
fields.help_text: Oats, Quinoa, Gluten free foods (breads, pasta), Buckwheat Chips, Corn Flour, Oatmeal, Polenta, Rice, Rice Noodles

fields.label: Notes & Observations
fields.placeholder: Document client's tolerance, symptoms, or preferences

sections.title: Nuts and Seeds
sections.description: Track your client's tolerance and notes for different nuts and seeds

fields.label: Low FODMAP Nuts/Seeds
fields.help_text: Almonds, Chestnuts, Hazelnuts, Macadamia Nuts, Peanuts, Pecans, Poppy Seeds, Pumpkin Seeds, Sesame Seeds, Sunflower Seeds, Walnuts

fields.label: Notes & Observations
fields.placeholder: Document client's tolerance, symptoms, or preferences

sections.title: Milk and Milk Substitutes
sections.description: Track your client's tolerance and notes for different milk products

fields.label: High FODMAP Milk
fields.help_text: Cow Milk, Goat Milk, Sheep's Milk, Soy Milk

fields.label: Low FODMAP Milk Substitutes
fields.help_text: Almond Milk, Coconut Milk, Hemp Milk, Lactose Free Milk, Oat Milk, Rice Milk, Soy Milk (made with soy protein)

fields.label: Notes & Observations
fields.placeholder: Document client's tolerance, symptoms, or preferences

sections.title: Dairy and Eggs
sections.description: Track your client's tolerance and notes for different dairy products

fields.label: High FODMAP Dairy
fields.help_text: Buttermilk Cream, Custard, Greek Yoghurt, Ice Cream, Sour Cream, Cream Cheese, Ricotta Cheese

fields.label: Low FODMAP Dairy
fields.help_text: Butter, Eggs, Chocolate (dark, milk, white), Brie, Cheddar, Cottage Cheese, Feta, Mozzarella, Parmesan, Swiss

fields.label: Notes & Observations
fields.placeholder: Document client's tolerance, symptoms, or preferences

sections.title: Condiments and Sweeteners
sections.description: Track your client's tolerance and notes for different condiments and sweeteners

fields.label: High FODMAP Condiments/Sweeteners
fields.help_text: Hummus Dip, Jam (mixed berries), Pasta Sauce (cream based), Relish, Agave, High Fructose Corn Syrup, Honey, Inulin, Sorbitol, Xylitol

fields.label: Low FODMAP Condiments/Sweeteners
fields.help_text: Barbeque Sauce, Chutney, Strawberry (jam or jelly), Mayonnaise, Mustard, Soy Sauce, Tomato Sauce, Aspartame, Acesulfame K, Glucose, Saccharine, Stevia, Sucralose, Sugar (sucrose)

fields.label: Notes & Observations
fields.placeholder: Document client's tolerance, symptoms, or preferences

sections.title: Popular Drinks
sections.description: Track your client's tolerance and notes for different beverages

fields.label: High FODMAP Drinks
fields.help_text: Coconut Water, Apple Juice, Pear Juice, Mango Juice, Sodas with HFCS, Fennel Tea, Herbal Tea

fields.label: Low FODMAP Drinks
fields.help_text: Beer (one max), Coffee, Orange juice, Peppermint Tea, Water, Wine (one max)

fields.label: Notes & Observations
